name: Realms of Arkania: Blade of Destiny HD

description:
Realms of Arkania: Blade of Destiny HD is a RPG game developed by Crafty Studios. It was originally released in 2013. UIG Entertainment published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
Realms of Arkania: Blade of Destiny HD is available on PC.
